languages.text: {n}Дознаватель окидывает взглядом обстановку и снова упирается взглядом в содержимое ближайшей клетки.{/n} "Я начинаю догадываться. {g|Encyclopedia:Lexmechanic}Лексмеханик{/g} упоминал жителей нижних уровней, которых заперли в своих домах. Некоторых, по его словам, притащили сюда. Культисты сделали с этими несчастными что-то... в их собственных домах... и теперь изучают результат".

traits.locale_text: {n}Дознаватель окидывает взглядом обстановку и снова упирается взглядом в содержимое ближайшей клетки.{/n} "Я начинаю догадываться. {g|Encyclopedia:Lexmechanic}Лексмеханик{/g} упоминал жителей нижних уровней, которых заперли в своих домах. Некоторых, по его словам, притащили сюда. Культисты сделали с этими несчастными что-то... в их собственных домах... и теперь изучают результат".
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix takes in his surroundings and once again fixes his attention on the contents of the nearest cage.{/n} "I'm beginning to have some idea. The {g|Encyclopedia:Lexmechanic}Lexmechanic{/g} mentioned the inhabitants of the lower levels who had been imprisoned in their homes. He said some of them were brought here. The cultists did something to those poor people... in their own home... and now they are studying the result."

Некоторых, по его словам, притащили сюда. Культисты сделали с этими несчастными что-то... в их собственных домах... и теперь изучают результат".

The cultists did something to those poor people... in their own home... and now they are studying the result."

The {g|Encyclopedia:Lexmechanic}Lexmechanic{/g} mentioned the inhabitants of the lower levels who had been imprisoned in their homes. He said some of them were brought here. The cultists did something to those poor people... in their own home... and now they are studying the result."

languages.text: {n}海因里希打量着四周，随后，他的注意力再次集中在了最近的笼中的怪物身上。{/n}“我想到了某件事情。那个{g|Encyclopedia:Lexmechanic}思律机僧{/g}提到，那些底层的居民被囚禁在了家里。他告诉我们，其中一部分人被带到了这里，那群邪教徒对那些可怜人做了某些事情……就在他们自己的家中……而现在，那些邪教徒正在研究他们的成果。”
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix takes in his surroundings and once again fixes his attention on the contents of the nearest cage.{/n} "I'm beginning to have some idea. The {g|Encyclopedia:Lexmechanic}Lexmechanic{/g} mentioned the inhabitants of the lower levels who had been imprisoned in their homes. He said some of them were brought here. The cultists did something to those poor people... in their own home... and now they are studying the result."

traits.locale_text: {n}海因里希打量着四周，随后，他的注意力再次集中在了最近的笼中的怪物身上。{/n}“我想到了某件事情。那个{g|Encyclopedia:Lexmechanic}法律技工{/g}提到，那些底层的居民被囚禁在了家里。他告诉我们，其中一部分人被带到了这里，那群邪教徒对那些可怜人做了某些事情……就在他们自己的家中……而现在，那些邪教徒正在研究他们的成果。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix mira a su alrededor y una vez más se centra en el contenido de la jaula más cercana.{/n} «Empiezo a hacerme a la idea. El {g|Encyclopedia:Lexmechanic}lexmecánico{/g} ha mencionado que los habitantes de los niveles inferiores habían sido encerrados en sus casas. Y a algunos los habían traído aquí. Esos sectarios han hecho algo con esta pobre gente en sus hogares... y ahora estudian el resultado».
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix takes in his surroundings and once again fixes his attention on the contents of the nearest cage.{/n} "I'm beginning to have some idea. The {g|Encyclopedia:Lexmechanic}Lexmechanic{/g} mentioned the inhabitants of the lower levels who had been imprisoned in their homes. He said some of them were brought here. The cultists did something to those poor people... in their own home... and now they are studying the result."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix mira a su alrededor y una vez más se centra en el contenido de la jaula más cercana.{/n} «Empiezo a hacerme a la idea. El {g|Encyclopedia:Lexmechanic}lexmecánico{/g} ha mencionado que los habitantes de los niveles inferiores habían sido encerrados en sus casas. Y a algunos los habían traído aquí. Esos sectarios han hecho algo con esta pobre gente en sus hogares... y ahora estudian el resultado».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}ハインリックスは周囲を見渡し、再び近くの檻の中身に目を向けた。{/n}「なんとなくわかってきましたね。{g|Encyclopedia:Lexmechanic}法技術者{/g}が言っていたのは、彼らの家に幽閉されていた下層の住人たちのことだったのだ。そのうちの何人かがここに連れてこられたと言っていました。教団はその哀れな人々に何かをした…彼らの家の中で…そして今、その結果を研究しているのでしょう」
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix takes in his surroundings and once again fixes his attention on the contents of the nearest cage.{/n} "I'm beginning to have some idea. The {g|Encyclopedia:Lexmechanic}Lexmechanic{/g} mentioned the inhabitants of the lower levels who had been imprisoned in their homes. He said some of them were brought here. The cultists did something to those poor people... in their own home... and now they are studying the result."

traits.locale_text: {n}ハインリックスは周囲を見渡し、再び近くの檻の中身に目を向けた。{/n}「なんとなくわかってきましたね。{g|Encyclopedia:Lexmechanic}法技術者{/g}が言っていたのは、彼らの家に幽閉されていた下層の住人たちのことだったのだ。そのうちの何人かがここに連れてこられたと言っていました。教団はその哀れな人々に何かをした…彼らの家の中で…そして今、その結果を研究しているのでしょう」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix überprüft seine Umgebung und konzentriert seine Aufmerksamkeit erneut auf den Inhalt des nächststehenden Käfigs.{/n} "Ich entwickle langsam eine Ahnung. Der {g|Encyclopedia:Lexmechanic}Lexmechanicus{/g} erwähnte die Bewohner der unteren Ebenen, die bei sich zu Hause eingesperrt wurden. Er sagte, einige von ihnen wurden hierhergebracht. Die Kultisten haben etwas mit diesen armen Leuten gemacht ... in ihren eigenen Häusern ... und jetzt studieren sie das Resultat."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix takes in his surroundings and once again fixes his attention on the contents of the nearest cage.{/n} "I'm beginning to have some idea. The {g|Encyclopedia:Lexmechanic}Lexmechanic{/g} mentioned the inhabitants of the lower levels who had been imprisoned in their homes. He said some of them were brought here. The cultists did something to those poor people... in their own home... and now they are studying the result."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix überprüft seine Umgebung und konzentriert seine Aufmerksamkeit erneut auf den Inhalt des nächststehenden Käfigs.{/n} "Ich entwickle langsam eine Ahnung. Der {g|Encyclopedia:Lexmechanic}Lexmechanicus{/g} erwähnte die Bewohner der unteren Ebenen, die bei sich zu Hause eingesperrt wurden. Er sagte, einige von ihnen wurden hierhergebracht. Die Kultisten haben etwas mit diesen armen Leuten gemacht ... in ihren eigenen Häusern ... und jetzt studieren sie das Resultat."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix jette un coup d'œil aux alentours, puis reporte son attention sur la cage la plus proche.{/n} « Je commence à comprendre. Le {g|Encyclopedia:Lexmechanic}lexmécanicien{/g} a mentionné que les habitants des niveaux inférieurs avaient été emprisonnés dans leurs quartiers et que certains avaient été amenés ici. Les cultistes ont fait quelque chose à ces pauvres gens... chez eux... et maintenant, ils en étudient le résultat. »
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix takes in his surroundings and once again fixes his attention on the contents of the nearest cage.{/n} "I'm beginning to have some idea. The {g|Encyclopedia:Lexmechanic}Lexmechanic{/g} mentioned the inhabitants of the lower levels who had been imprisoned in their homes. He said some of them were brought here. The cultists did something to those poor people... in their own home... and now they are studying the result."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix jette un coup d'œil aux alentours, puis reporte son attention sur la cage la plus proche.{/n} « Je commence à comprendre. Le {g|Encyclopedia:Lexmechanic}lexmécanicien{/g} a mentionné que les habitants des niveaux inférieurs avaient été emprisonnés dans leurs quartiers et que certains avaient été amenés ici. Les cultistes ont fait quelque chose à ces pauvres gens... chez eux... et maintenant, ils en étudient le résultat. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix etrafına bakıp ilgisini tekrar en yakınındaki kafese yönlendiriyor.{/n} "Aklımda bir fikir oluşmaya başladı. {g|Encyclopedia:Lexmechanic}Lexmekanik{/g}, alt seviyelerdekilerin kendi evlerine hapsedildiklerinden bahsetmişti. Bazıları da buraya getirilmiş. Tarikatçılar, bu zavallı insanlara bir şeyler yapmış... Hem de kendi evlerinde... Şimdi de neticeyi gözlemliyorlar."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix takes in his surroundings and once again fixes his attention on the contents of the nearest cage.{/n} "I'm beginning to have some idea. The {g|Encyclopedia:Lexmechanic}Lexmechanic{/g} mentioned the inhabitants of the lower levels who had been imprisoned in their homes. He said some of them were brought here. The cultists did something to those poor people... in their own home... and now they are studying the result."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix etrafına bakıp ilgisini tekrar en yakınındaki kafese yönlendiriyor.{/n} “Aklımda bir fikir oluşmaya başladı. {g|Encyclopedia:Lexmechanic}Lexmekanik{/g}, alt seviyelerdekilerin kendi evlerine hapsedildiklerinden bahsetmişti. Bazıları da buraya getirilmiş. Tarikatçılar, bu zavallı insanlara bir şeyler yapmış... Kendi evlerinde... Şimdi de neticeyi gözlemliyorlar.”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
